title: Simple Switch Network
description: Connect three computers through a switch. All devices must be on the same network.
requirements: All three hosts must be on the same network (192.168.1.0/24)
Each host must have a unique IP address
All hosts should be able to communicate with each other
hints: With subnet mask 255.255.255.0, all IPs must be 192.168.1.X
Avoid using .221 and .254 as they're already assigned
